DOC.detailed_description: We would like determine HBA® test sperm couple presume idiopathic infertility reveal lower binding percentage couple identifiable cause infertility either male factor tubal factor We would like determine patient abnormal HBA binding decrease IVF outcome : decrease clinical pregnancy rate , implantation rate , increase miscarriage rate
DOC.criteria: . All group include female 40 year age undergo 1st IVF cycle 3 group 1 . Abnormal Semen Analysis ( sperm count < 10 million/ml /or rapid progressive motility < 50 % , WHO morphology < 30 % ) normal HSG , normal ovarian reserve test ovulation test 2 . Unexplained infertility normal ovarian reserve test ovulation testing ( FSH < 10 , AMH > 1.0 ) Normal ovulatory cycle , normal WHO semen analysis . Normal tubes HSG Laparoscopy 3 . Tubal infertility assess HSG laparoscopy woman 40 , prior fail IVF
